name: Jai_Raventhorn

attributes.name: Affiliation(s)
values: Alliance to Restore the RepublicSpecForce 5th Regiment

content:
Jai Raventhorn was a Human female Rebel commando. In 2 ABY she led a Rebel team to Bevell Three to capture four Imperial agents, but the mission was compromised: only Jai escaped. The four Infiltrators commandos who died included Leong. As a propaganda measure rather than a reward, Jai was promoted to Master Sergeant. At one point, she was engaged to Kr√ºl, but he perished before the couple could get married.
Two months after the Battle of Endor she was captured by Imperial forces on Zelos II. After an interrogation she shared a prison cell with freelance mercenary Dirk Harkness, with whose mercenary group, Black Curs, she would eventually become affiliated to some degree. Her younger sister Morgan Q. Raventhorn was a Rebel SpecForce major who died in the Battle of Endor.
Jai owned a Class 720 freighter called the Doomsayer.
